evidence.claim: Cosmos Pharmaceuticals emphasizes HIPAA compliance in their handling of patient data.
The company mentions the use of health data interoperability standards such as FHIR in their software solutions.
References to X12 transaction sets indicate capability for healthcare transactions.
Their infrastructure supports secure data processing compliant with healthcare regulations.

icp.icp_reason: Lacks evidence of relevant X12 use cases or a substantial tech focus in healthcare data exchange.
